overview:
Frank Westerholt is the co-founder of Badongo.com.

Today, Mr. Westerholtâ€™s principal focus at Badongo is product development and traffic growth and as a result of his efforts, Badongo is the fastest growing service of its type in the world.

Mr. Westerholt is an expert in all aspects of internet traffic management, a skilled internet software engineering and an accomplished entrepreneur. Mr. Westerholt was a pioneer in the fields of Search Engine Optimization, domain brokering and has created and managed an array of webmaster affiliate programs. For the last 10 years, Mr. Westerholt has applied his considerable business and technical acumen to the design and deployment of advertising-driven Internet portals.

Prior to becoming an entrepreneur, from 1993 to 1995, Mr. Westerholt worked in the advertising industry in Germany. Mr. Westerholt, a native of Germany, holds degrees in business and computer sciences.
